title: Bug 17825 ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.SINGLE under the Text tab in the ControlExample of the SWT example and then switching back to SWT.MULTI, the ControlExampleText beeps.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not beep when switching between SWT.SINGLE and SWT.MULTI under the Text tab in the ControlExample of the SWT example.
SR:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
- The ControlExampleText should not beep during the switching process.
